attributes.name: Grim Luck
attributes.description: "Better luck next time."
attributes.parsed_description: "Better luck next time."

attributes.name: Grim Tidings
attributes.description: "I come bearing bad news."
attributes.parsed_description: "I come bearing bad news."

attributes.name: Gripping Rime
attributes.description: "The rime of the winter seas change a person. Be wary."
attributes.parsed_description: "The rime of the winter seas change a person. Be wary."

attributes.name: Grove Keeper's Fire Staff
attributes.description: "Sometimes the forest must burn so that life can begin anew."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes the forest must burn so that life can begin anew."

attributes.name: Grovewarden
attributes.description: "With your hand on the wyrdwood grip, you feel an aura of clarity and purpose."
attributes.parsed_description: "With your hand on the wyrdwood grip, you feel an aura of clarity and purpose."

attributes.name: Growing Season
attributes.description: "There is a season for everything. A seasons for growing crops. And one for growing vendettas."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is a season for everything. A seasons for growing crops. And one for growing vendettas."

attributes.name: Guard Captain's Maul
attributes.description: "Keeping the peasants away from royalty is not easy work."
attributes.parsed_description: "Keeping the peasants away from royalty is not easy work."

attributes.name: Guardian's Charge
attributes.description: "Long held by the guard captain of Amarine Temple, it is unknown how this battlescarred blade ended up in the hands of humans."
attributes.parsed_description: "Long held by the guard captain of Amarine Temple, it is unknown how this battlescarred blade ended up in the hands of humans."

attributes.name: Guardian's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Guardian's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."
attributes.parsed_description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.name: Guardian's Flatbow
attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."
attributes.parsed_description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.name: Guardian's Great Axe

attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."
attributes.parsed_description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.name: Guardian's Hatchet
attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."
attributes.parsed_description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.name: Guardian's Imbued Fire Staff
attributes.description: "Charged by the Ancients to keep watch over their creations, the Guardians have employed a number of methods to safeguard their secrets."
attributes.parsed_description: "Charged by the Ancients to keep watch over their creations, the Guardians have employed a number of methods to safeguard their secrets."

attributes.name: Guardian's Kite Shield
attributes.name_with_affixes: Guardian's Kite Shield of the Soldier
attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.name: Guardian's Round Shield
attributes.name_with_affixes: Guardian's Round Shield of the Soldier
attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."
attributes.parsed_description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.name: Guardian's Warhammer
attributes.description: "The Ancient Guardians weapons are a fascinating study of the craftsmanship left behind by the Ancients."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Ancient Guardians weapons are a fascinating study of the craftsmanship left behind by the Ancients."

attributes.name: Guardian's War Hammer
attributes.name_with_affixes: Guardian's War Hammer of the Soldier
attributes.description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."
attributes.parsed_description: "I stand unwavering before the precipice of eternity."

attributes.name: Guillotine
attributes.description: "The people shall have their say."
attributes.parsed_description: "The people shall have their say."

attributes.name: Gutpiercer
attributes.description: "Designed to inflict maximum pain."
attributes.parsed_description: "Designed to inflict maximum pain."

attributes.name: Gutshot
attributes.description: "I'm not telling you where to aim, but if you want to be sure to hit, aim for the center of mass. Heahshots can wait till you've got more experience."
attributes.parsed_description: "I'm not telling you where to aim, but if you want to be sure to hit, aim for the center of mass. Heahshots can wait till you've got more experience."

attributes.name: Gutskewer
attributes.description: "The executioner jammed the spear into his prisoner's abdomen, ripping out his entrails."
attributes.parsed_description: "The executioner jammed the spear into his prisoner's abdomen, ripping out his entrails."

attributes.name: Gutsticker
attributes.description: "One thrust and I'll have won our duel."
attributes.parsed_description: "One thrust and I'll have won our duel."

attributes.name: Hailstorm
attributes.description: "The frozen arrows crashed and shattered upon the battlements as they fled in terror."
attributes.parsed_description: "The frozen arrows crashed and shattered upon the battlements as they fled in terror."

attributes.name: Hallowed Rapier
attributes.description: "A revered weapon among the templars."
attributes.parsed_description: "A revered weapon among the templars."

attributes.name: Hammer of Forgotten Dreams
attributes.description: "Trying to remember a fleeting dream is like trying to catch a piece of paper in a hurricane."
attributes.parsed_description: "Trying to remember a fleeting dream is like trying to catch a piece of paper in a hurricane."

attributes.name: Hammer of Justice
attributes.description: "The Queen's justice must be delivered by any means necessary."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Queen's justice must be delivered by any means necessary."

attributes.name: Hammer of the Corrupted Champion
attributes.description: "The corrupted have their heroes too."
attributes.parsed_description: "The corrupted have their heroes too."

attributes.name: Hammer of the Haunted Hill
attributes.description: "The hill just outside of town was full of graves that had been recently disturbed as their former denizens arose from a long slumber."
attributes.parsed_description: "The hill just outside of town was full of graves that had been recently disturbed as their former denizens arose from a long slumber."

attributes.name: Hamstring
attributes.description: "Strike at their legs before you strike at their head."
attributes.parsed_description: "Strike at their legs before you strike at their head."

attributes.name: Hand of Denier
attributes.description: "Filled with a power from beyond the grave, seeking something to replace what was once lost."
attributes.parsed_description: "Filled with a power from beyond the grave, seeking something to replace what was once lost."

attributes.name: Harbinger
attributes.description: "May your first step be a sure sign the battle's end is near."
attributes.parsed_description: "May your first step be a sure sign the battle's end is near."

attributes.name: Harbinger of Dusk
attributes.description: "Dusk comes and with it, a great evil."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dusk comes and with it, a great evil."

attributes.name: Harbinger of Ethereal Power
attributes.description: "They who wield me possess the power of those before me."
attributes.parsed_description: "They who wield me possess the power of those before me."

attributes.name: Harbinger of the End
attributes.description: "When we saw the creature standing at our gate, we knew the end was here."
attributes.parsed_description: "When we saw the creature standing at our gate, we knew the end was here."

attributes.name: Harbinger's Call
attributes.description: "Hear my cry and know that I am with you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Hear my cry and know that I am with you."

attributes.name: Harbinger's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Harbinger's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "Fear me not. Fear what comes in my wake."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fear me not. Fear what comes in my wake."
